title: For the River Is Wide and the Gods Are Hungry
description: In this Tales from Harmony short story, it should be the best time of Becky's life. Her studies at Stanley University are going well, and her boyfriend, Mark, has just asked her to marry him. But when she returns to her childhood home, Becky finds she must deal once more with the events of one horribly hot summer day, a deadly past that now threatens to steal all her future happiness.Tales from Harmony short stories offer horror fans much more to experience in the Harmony, Indiana setting that is featured in Michael West novels such as Cinema of Shadows and The Wide Game.Be sure to check out other eBook short stories that are part of the Seventh Star Singles collection!
author: Michael  West
